name: EHDSImagingStudy
title: Imaging study model
description: EHDS refined base model for Imaging study

element.short: Imaging study model
element.definition: EHDS refined base model for Imaging study

element.short: Common header for all patient-related data
element.definition: Common header for all patient-related data

element.short: Subject
element.definition: Patient/subject information

element.short: Identifiers for the Imaging Study such as DICOM Study Instance UID. If one or more series elements are present in the ImagingStudy, then there shall be one DICOM Study UID identifier.
element.definition: Business identifier for the object

element.short: Authorship
element.definition: Resource authoring details

element.short: Author
element.definition: Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.

element.short: Date and time of authoring/issuing
element.definition: Date and time of the issuing the document/resource by its author.

element.short: Date and time of the last update to the resource
element.definition: Date and time of the last update to the document/information

element.short: Status of the resource
element.definition: Status of the resource

element.short: Reason for the current status of the resource.
element.definition: Reason for the current status of the resource.

element.short: Language
element.definition: Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.

element.short: Version
element.definition: Business version of the resource.

element.short: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document
element.definition: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document

element.short: All of the distinct values for series' modalities
element.definition: All of the distinct values for series' modalities

element.short: Reference to the encounter with which this imaging study is associated
element.definition: Reference to the encounter with which this imaging study is associated

element.short: Date and time the study started.
element.definition: Date and time the study started.

element.short: References to the diagnostic requests that resulted in this imaging study being performed.
element.definition: References to the diagnostic requests that resulted in this imaging study being performed.

element.short: Number of Series in the Study. This value given may be larger than the number of series elements this Resource contains due to resource availability, security, or other factors. This element should be present if any series elements are present.
element.definition: Number of Series in the Study. This value given may be larger than the number of series elements this Resource contains due to resource availability, security, or other factors. This element should be present if any series elements are present.

element.short: Number of Service-Object Pairs (SOP) Instances in Study. This value given may be larger than the number of instance elements this resource contains due to resource availability, security, or other factors. This element should be present if any instance elements are present.
element.definition: Number of Service-Object Pairs (SOP) Instances in Study. This value given may be larger than the number of instance elements this resource contains due to resource availability, security, or other factors. This element should be present if any instance elements are present.

element.short: The Imaging Manager description of the study. Institution-generated description or classification of the Study (component) performed.
element.definition: The Imaging Manager description of the study. Institution-generated description or classification of the Study (component) performed.

element.short: Organisation name, address, contact information.
element.definition: Organisation name, address, contact information.

element.short: Study endpoint describing the technical details of a location that can be connected to for the delivery/retrieval of information. Sufficient information is required to ensure that a connection can be made securely, and appropriate data transmitted as defined by the endpoint owner. These may be locally hosted services, regional services, or national service.
element.definition: Study endpoint describing the technical details of a location that can be connected to for the delivery/retrieval of information. Sufficient information is required to ensure that a connection can be made securely, and appropriate data transmitted as defined by the endpoint owner. These may be locally hosted services, regional services, or national service.

element.short: Series. Each study has one or more series of instances, but they may be absent when no series information needs to be conveyed
element.definition: Series. Each study has one or more series of instances, but they may be absent when no series information needs to be conveyed

element.short: DICOM Series Instance UID for the series
element.definition: DICOM Series Instance UID for the series

element.short: Numeric identifier of this series
element.definition: Numeric identifier of this series

element.short: Acquisition modality - the modality used for this series
element.definition: Acquisition modality - the modality used for this series

element.short: A short human readable summary of the series
element.definition: A short human readable summary of the series

element.short: Number of Series Related Instances
